video.title: Drugged
video.synopsis: In this gritty documentary series, doctors try to persuade addicts to get sober by showing them how drugs have impacted all aspects of their lives.

episodes.synopsis: A journey through the human body shows the effects of marijuana, from the first inhalation to the lung membranes and into the bloodstream.
episodes.title: High on Marijuana

episodes.synopsis: Doctors provide a glimpse inside the human body to explore what causes the extreme highs and lows this widely used stimulant creates.
episodes.title: High on Cocaine

episodes.synopsis: Computer graphics and journeys inside the body and brain provide a window to examine the effects of ecstasy on two users of the popular party drug.
episodes.title: High on Ecstasy
